DOC.brief_summary: A Phase III , Randomized , Observer-Blind , Controlled , Multicenter Clinical Study Evaluate Efficacy , Safety Immunogenicity MF59-Adjuvanted Quadrivalent Influenza Vaccine Compared Non-influenza Vaccine Comparator Adults ≥ 65 Years Age .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Evaluate Efficacy , Safety Immunogenicity MF59-Adjuvanted Quadrivalent Influenza Vaccine Compared Non-influenza Vaccine Comparator Adults ≥ 65 Years Age
